title: Nina Thècle Ahishakiye — MBA Portfolio
text:
Profile Summary
Strategic and solutions-driven MBA Candidate with 5+ years of experience in project coordination, stakeholder engagement, and international development operations across 34 countries in Africa and the EU. Proven ability to deliver complex initiatives with efficiency, diplomacy, and strong cross-cultural communication. Passionate about operational excellence, public–private partnerships, and leveraging data-driven insights to strengthen organizational performance.

title: Nina Thècle Ahishakiye — MBA Portfolio
text:
Professional Experience Highlights

Project Assistant & Liaison Officer — AML/CFT ESCAY (EU DG INTPA)

Coordinated multinational initiatives and represented stakeholders in 34 African countries and EU member states.

Led conference moderation, reporting, and operational file systems enhancing efficiency and productivity.

Organized high-level missions, ensuring strong collaboration and timely delivery of project outputs.



Consultant, Research Analyst — Drolls & Associates

Conducted multinational market research and produced insights on 600+ pathology labs, enabling strategic decisions in four European countries.



Department Lead, Language Training — Newbridge Connect

Launched corporate French/English programs and pioneered partnerships to expand international learning services.

title: Nina Thècle Ahishakiye — MBA Portfolio
text:

Supported policy-influencing AML/CFT initiatives in Eastern, Southern & Central Africa.

Notes for Publishing

To preview as a website locally:
quarto preview nina-portfolio.qmd
To render to a standalone web page:
quarto render nina-portfolio.qmd
You can publish the generated HTML to GitHub Pages, Netlify, or Vercel.
